text: Hagi tare mofavreraremofo nezanarera Rispa'a asunku kukena erino vuno ana tva'onte me'nea have agofetu ome rutareno tafe hu'ne. Hagi bali ne'zama hamare knareti vuno ko knafima ufre'neana hanine zagenena agra ana vahe'mokizmi zmavufare kegava hu'neno, atrege'za namazagane afi zagagafamo'za zamavufaga eme one'naze.
